Hotels.title: Brecon Beacons National Park
Hotels.name: Beili Helyg Guest House
Hotels.directions: From Penderyn, follow Cwm Cadlan road from Lamb Hotel for 1.5 miles, you'll see sign and yellow grit bin at the gate on your left.
Hotels.content: Fantastic little B&B with 3 rooms, all en-suite. Very comfortable beds, friendly hosts, delicious breakfasts. Ideally placed for waterfalls and mountains, Walkers and cyclists welcome.

Hotels.title: Eleuthera
Hotels.name: Valentines Resort & Marina
Hotels.content: Valentines is the most vibrant and exciting luxury resort in Harbour Island, Bahamas.  The resort offers 40 spacious, tropically appointed luxury suites with fully equipped kitchens and a 50 slip state of the art Yacht Marina.

Hotels.title: Puerto Iguazú
Hotels.name: Poramba Hostel
Hotels.content: Small, friendly and relaxed hostel, offering both shared and private rooms. In a very nice, tranquil and green part of town, only 300mts. from the bus terminal. Good kitchen. Swimming pool.

Hotels.title: Lappeenranta
Hotels.name: Matkustajakoti Turisti-Lappee
Hotels.content: Centrally located. The shower facilities are shared, the double rooms have private toilets but the single rooms do not. Prices include breakfast and the use of the sauna facilities.

Hotels.title: Labuan
Hotels.name: Pulau Labuan Hotel
Hotels.content: a 2-star hotel. Rooms with A/C, attached toilet and wifi. Breakfast included.

Hotels.title: Lesotho
Hotels.name: Maliba Mountain Lodge
Hotels.content: New 5 star luxury lodge situated in the [[Ts'ehlanyane National Park]]. Luxury suites, excellent food and a location like no other.  Hiking and pony-trekking available.

Hotels.title: Carpentras
Hotels.name: Le Coq Hardi
Hotels.content: also has a restaurant

Hotels.title: Zierikzee
Hotels.name: Hotel Lotus
Hotels.content: The hotel rooms are above a Chinese restaurant. All rooms have views on the port.

Hotels.title: Zruč nad Sázavou
Hotels.name: Penzion pod Zámkem
Hotels.content: Offers nice rooms under the castle near the old town centre. You can also enjoy a café in this pension.

Hotels.title: Semmering
Hotels.name: Panhans Hotel
Hotels.content: Is a historic 4 stars hotel in the centre, which opened in 1888 and got enlarged since. For the restaurant of the hotel see above.

Hotels.title: Milan/Outer Milan
Hotels.name: Hotel Bonola
Hotels.content: Hotel Bonola is close to the freeway exits (the Tangenziale Ovest exit "Viale Certosa" is 1 km away), "Rho-Pero", the new trade show center and Mazdapalace the historical trade show center.

Hotels.title: Tweed
Hotels.name: Beachwood Hollow Resort
Hotels.content: Cottage rentals on Stoco Lake, boat rentals, sandy swimming beach, play area, docks, beach and lounge chairs, lake water slide, rafts, wi-fi.

Hotels.title: Edinburgh/Old Town
Hotels.name: Euro Hostel Edinburgh
Hotels.content: Kincaid's Court, Guthrie Street. In Cowgate, open every summer from June 8th until September 2nd. Budget accommodation in 43 apartments used as student residences during term time.

Hotels.title: Takamatsu
Hotels.name: Castle Hotel
Hotels.content: This hotel could easily be your best budget japanese style hotel experience. Japanese style rooms have a tea table, tv, kettle, fridge, a separate sleeping area with futon and a real japanese bath. Every room has yukata (kimono style robe) ready for guests. Friendly owner speaks good English. Don't get confused as the hotel is not marked in English. It's the first building after the railway crossing. The same railway crossing won't let you sleep early or late as it starts beeping every ten minutes from 6am to midnight.

Hotels.title: Gansbaai
Hotels.name: Haus Giotto B+B
Hotels.directions: In De Kelders, 5 km before Gansbaai.
Hotels.content: A modern, small and intimate B&B in the peaceful village of De Kelders.

Hotels.title: Helsinki/Central
Hotels.name: Eurohostel
Hotels.content: Helsinki's largest hostel, very close to the dock for the Viking Line ferry and the Uspenski Cathedral.  Dorms from €24.10, single rooms from €45 (plus €2.50/person for non-HI members).

Hotels.title: Tbilisi
Hotels.name: Walker Hostel
Hotels.directions: From Metro Freedom sq. to Leselidze st. in the end of Zdanevich upturn (behind Bethlemi st. 27).
Hotels.content: Cozy rooms, big living room, kitchen and balcony with incredible view. 24h reception, fan, airport transfers (11€), BBQ area, bicycle parking, cable TV, free parking, free WiFi, laundry, linen and towels included, lockers, luggage storage, tours/travel desk.

Hotels.title: Hargeisa
Hotels.name: Ambassador Hotel
Hotels.directions: 1.4 km north-west of the airport, just off the main highway
Hotels.content: One of only two Western-style hotels in Somaliland, the Ambassador is where foreign ambassadors stay when visiting the country. The facilities are top-notch by African standards, with a 24-hour gym, laundry, restaurants, non-alcoholic bar, room service, free Wi-Fi and a mosque. Additionally, the English-speaking hotel staff can organise visas, flights and tours to major Somaliland sights. Safe for solo female travellers.

Hotels.title: Blanes
Hotels.name: Hotel Santa Marta
Hotels.address: Playa de Santa Cristina, s/n - 17310 [[Lloret de Mar]]
Hotels.content: 5 stars

Hotels.title: Pécs
Hotels.name: HUNGUEST Hotel Kikelet
Hotels.alt: Art & Fit Hotel, Restaurant and Wellness
Hotels.directions: North one km from center. Next to Hotel Fenyves Panoráma
Hotels.content: The hotel is located at one of the most scenic spots of the Mecsek Mountains, directly above the downtown of Pécs. The hotel offers a unique view onto the town and the neighbouring hills.

Hotels.title: Paris/16th arrondissement
Hotels.name: Hotel Eiffel Kennedy
Hotels.content: Small three star hotel (33 rooms).

Hotels.title: Marrakech
Hotels.name: The Heart of the Medina backpackers hostel
Hotels.content: 1st backpackers hostel to be located in the Medina. 1 minute walk from Djemaa Place. Rooftop terrace, hot showers, comfortable surroundings. No more than 6 beds to a room. Breakfast included as are bed linens, towels, and free wifi. You can expect to pay €8 euro/person all year round per night if booked in advance via email or website. No lockouts, no curfews, and is open 24/7, 365 days/ year.

Hotels.title: Singapore/Chinatown
Hotels.name: Hotel Re!
Hotels.content: Former primary school repainted with eyeball-blistering fluorescent shades and thus now a 12-storey, 140-room "retro boutique" hotel.  Located on a hilltop (Pearl's Hill Park) and a 5-10min walking distance to Outram MRT station. Restaurant offers a variety of international cuisine and daily international-themed set meals at $18.80++.

Hotels.title: Sopron
Hotels.name: Black Sheep (Fekete Bárány) Restaurant, guesthouse
Hotels.content: Five rooms , Rent a bike, WIFI. Restaurant: Hungarian, folk food

Hotels.title: Christchurch
Hotels.name: Addington Court Motel
Hotels.content: Close to Addington Raceway, A&P Showgrounds and Westpac Trust Stadium.

Hotels.title: Logroño
Hotels.name: Hotel Murrieta
Hotels.content: 3-star hotel.

Hotels.title: Budapest/Pest
Hotels.name: ACHAT Premium Hotel Budapest
Hotels.price: dbl from HUF14500 all tax incl.
Hotels.content: ****Part of a German hotel chain. Rooms: 134. All rooms with air-conditioning. Five maisonette suites and Business and Superior rooms. Cosy "Bistrorante" with outdoor terrace offers both Hungarian specialities and international cuisine. Also here an elegant lobby bar.

Hotels.title: Tirana
Hotels.name: Freddy's Ho(s)tel
Hotels.content: Rooms are passable, usually with ensuite. No true dorm rooms. WiFi

Hotels.title: Bunbury
Hotels.name: Mantra Bunbury
Hotels.content: Opened in December 2008 Bunbury’s newest boutique property, Mantra Bunbury, presents a tangible vision of contemporary elegance and hospitality. This full service Hotel caters to business and leisure travelers as well as locals looking for an intimate getaway. Mantra Bunbury offers sixty-four superbly appointed deluxe and standard studio suites set within the heritage precinct of The Silos. Capture the historical aura of the Silos in the hotel lobby, the gallery featuring works by Leon Pericles and opening in March, a fully-licensed residential club lounge . Other hotel features include an enclosed year-round climate controlled swimming pool and deck, a spa, tennis courts, landscaped gardens, professionally managed state of the art health spa and off-street parking

Hotels.title: Saint Petersburg/North
Hotels.name: Gostinitsa «Viborgskaya»
Hotels.content: "Turris" network of hotels. A few minutes walk from the subway. Built on the Soviet era, which imposes limits on the number of rooms, and casts doubt on the three stars. There are rooms with no amenities, finishing standard rooms could be better. If the budget allows, better to stay in the junior suites and above. The lobby has a free hour internet Wi-Fi, bar and restaurant on the ground floor, you can order breakfast or half-board by the "buffet".

Hotels.title: Copenhagen/Vesterbro
Hotels.name: Copenhagen Island
Hotels.content: Newly build 4 Star hotel located on its own artificial island in the harbour - hence the name - which apart from some exceptions, gives you good views from the room. Stylish interiors and good service. And one of Copenhagen's largest shopping centers right next door.

Hotels.title: Győr
Hotels.name: Alfa Hotel and
Hotels.content: *** Eleven rooms, 26 beds. All rooms with color TV, mini bar, telephone, safe and air conditioning. Parking and storage are free. 24 hour reception. Free Wi-Fi..

Hotels.title: Sibiu
Hotels.name: Sibiu Travelers Hostel/Villa Teilor
Hotels.price: €10.80 per night, including breakfast and tea, coffee and cooled mineral water day & night and free laundry
Hotels.content: In a quiet area close to the train and bus station (5 min walk) and another 9 minutes walk from the ancient centre. Breakfast, coffee, tea and mineral water included. 2 PCs and fast wireless Internet everywhere, personal lockers & towels for free, spacious, cozy garden with wooden benches & tables and a patio curled around by wine ranks. Two bathrooms & toilets, a fully equipped kitchen and free laundry.

Hotels.title: Rovaniemi
Hotels.name: B&B Reindeerstreet 24
Hotels.content: Friendly bed & breakfast next to Ounasvaara, about 1.3 km from downtown, can arrange tours and activities during your stay.

Hotels.title: Timișoara
Hotels.name: Hostel Costel
Hotels.content: A house and huge garden with lots of common places, a really big and nice equipped kitchen. Free Wi-Fi, lockers in every room and friendly hosts who can help with every question.

Hotels.title: Orchha
Hotels.name: Sheesh Mahal
Hotels.content: Beautifully designed hotel situated in the palace.

Hotels.title: Kaunas
Hotels.name: Daniela Hotel
Hotels.content: 4 stars hotel is in the very heart of the city, next to the main pedestrian street Laisves Avenue. 75 rooms.

Hotels.title: Salalah
Hotels.name: Haffah House
Hotels.address: Al Matar and Ar Robat Sts
Hotels.content: Old rooms, basic but decent. Very close to the airport and in the centre of the city so it's easy to reach any place you want to get to, reasonable swimming pool, gym and tennis courts. Banking and rent a car services are available in the same building.

Hotels.title: Heredia
Hotels.name: Hotel America
Hotels.content: Probably the most comfortable place in downtown Heredia. It is located half a block from Parque Central.

Hotels.title: Yurihonjo
Hotels.name: Route Inn Hotel
Hotels.alt: ホテル ルートイン 由利本荘
Hotels.directions: At the junction of Highway 7 and Highway 107 in Honjo.
Hotels.content: This hotel has a convenient location for people traveling by car.

Hotels.title: Debar
Hotels.name: Hotel Kosovrast
Hotels.price: Standard / Modern / Suite €24/28/34 per person & full board
Hotels.content: Hotel Kosovrasti is located on the cost of Debar's Lake. A perfect place to stay and also get a medical treatment using thermo-mineral waters.

Hotels.title: Sarandë
Hotels.name: Porto Eda Hotel
Hotels.content: The simple. Mobile: +355 69 7233180

Hotels.title: Tbilisi
Hotels.name: Veziko apartments
Hotels.content: Warm and cosy apartments to stay at, a lovely and hospitable family run this place in Old Tbilisi, so backpackers who are into local lifestyle would be able to feel it by staying in a real georgian house, about 25$ per night/double bed. internet, stove and bath is available.

Hotels.title: Shanghai/Huangpu
Hotels.name: Les Suites Orient, Bund Shanghai
Hotels.content: Right on the Bund opposite the ferry terminal, the Les Suites Orient lives up to its name. The free breakfast is not to be missed.

Hotels.title: New Orleans/Uptown
Hotels.name: Creole Gardens Bed and Breakfast Inn
Hotels.content: One block from the St. Charles Ave. Streetcar Line. Next to the Warehouse District, and just 12 blocks from the French Quarter. Famous for colorful banana courtyard, kid and pet friendly and great hot breakfast.

Hotels.title: Alajuela
Hotels.name: Villa Calas
Hotels.content: Chalet style rooms and restaurant near Poás Volcano.

Hotels.title: Vientiane
Hotels.name: Saysouly Guesthouse
Hotels.address: 23 Manthatulath Road, Ban Xieng Yeun, Vientiane
Hotels.content: Nice, atmospheric. Family suite upstairs is huge, clean, very comfortable, and an excellent value. Warning: bedbugs (Dec 2014).

Hotels.title: Copenhagen/Østerbro
Hotels.name: Hotel Rye
Hotels.checkin: Until 9PM, but later check-in is possible for a fee
Hotels.content: This is a small, unusual hotel with a cozy atmosphere and homemade buns with the breakfast, feels like a real apartment, complete with showers and toilets down the hallway.

Hotels.title: Da Nang
Hotels.name: HAGL Plaza Da Nang
Hotels.directions: Corner of Nguyen Van Linh & Hoang Dieu
Hotels.content: 206 air conditioned rooms, all of which have cable TV, Internet, minibar, and shower with bathtub. Has spa and swimming pool, fitness room/gym, and restaurant, bar and café.

Hotels.title: Dumaguete
Hotels.name: Hotel Palwa
Hotels.content: near international ATM

Hotels.title: Hadrian's Wall
Hotels.name: The Greenhead Hotel and Hostel
Hotels.content: Both the hotel and hostel are a short distance from the wall. For the hostel, ask at the hotel.

Hotels.title: Barcelona/Eixample
Hotels.name: Hotel del Comte
Hotels.content: 1 km from La Rambla. Renovated in 2007 and now boasts super-slick rooms with glass and marble bathrooms, flat panel TVs, free Wi-Fi. Problems with 3rd-party bookings reported, so book directly.

Hotels.title: Arequipa
Hotels.name: Pirwa Park Hostel Arequipa
Hotels.directions: San Cercado Arequipa. A few steps from the Plaza de Armas
Hotels.content: Free breakfast, free internet, pick up service, kitchen, laundry, breakfast and comfortable beds.

Hotels.title: Shikinejima
Hotels.name: Kamanoshita campsite
Hotels.content: Near the beach, not far from the hot springs. No reservation. Closed during July, August, January, February and Golden Week. Toilets, water, BBQ place.

Hotels.title: Malang
Hotels.name: Hotel Pelangi
Hotels.content: Centrally located mid range hotel in the city.

Hotels.title: Sydney/Darling Harbour
Hotels.name: Hotel Ibis Darling Harbour
Hotels.content: Economy international hotel, right on the western edge of Darling Harbour, near Harbourside

Hotels.title: Murmansk
Hotels.name: Park Inn Poliarnie Zori
Hotels.directions: A short walk up the hill from the Detskiy Mir bus stop.
Hotels.price: From 1300 rubles for a basic single
Hotels.content: A clean, well-located hotel with helpful front desk staff. Includes the very popular nightclub Ledokol ("Ледокол") which often hosts live music performances.

Hotels.title: Käsivarsi Wilderness Area
Hotels.name: Jogasjärvi open wilderness hut
Hotels.content: Open wilderness hut (4 persons). Fireplace (should have been repaired by fall 2014, check).

Hotels.title: Urban camping in Japan
Hotels.name: Dogo Park
Hotels.content: Very nice, big, quiet park. Has public toilets, rest huts and vending machines. It is very near Dogo Onsen (oldest onsen in Japan and a considerable tourist attraction) so it is well located. Also, if you are doing the [[88 Temple Pilgrimage|Shikoku Pilgrimage]], you are not straying far away from the henro path, and you will be assured a good night's rest as camping pilgrims are highly respected and you will not be bothered by anyone.

Hotels.title: Turku
Hotels.name: Radisson Blu Hotel Marina Palace
Hotels.content: Located on Linnankatu overlooking the River Aura Hotel Marina Palace is considered by many to be the best hotel in Turku. It has housed many celebrities visiting Turku, including Queen Elizabeth II and royal family of Sweden. With well-appointed, baroque-style rooms overlooking the Aura River, it offers premium lodging at the city centre. You can dine at two on-site restaurants including the popular ''Grill it! Marina'', and take advantage of enticing benefits like complimentary access to the fully equipped gym.

Hotels.title: Tallinn
Hotels.name: Barons Boutique Hotel
Hotels.content: The hotel is in an old bank building and features and overdose of pretentiousness for what are essentially quite simple rooms.

Hotels.title: Las Vegas
Hotels.name: Mandalay Bay
Hotels.content: Located at the far southern end of the Strip next to the Luxor.

Hotels.title: Schiphol Airport
Hotels.name: citizenM Amsterdam Airport
Hotels.content: A modern budget hotel with trendy design rooms. Every room has Wi-Fi access, films-on-demand and an LCD television.
